name: Music Bot
description: A Telegram Music Bot written in Python using Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls

API_ID.description: Telegram app id, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Telegram app hash, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: if you need then add bot_token

SUDOERS.description: ID of sudo users who have special access (separate multiple ids with space)

PREFIX.description: Bot commad prefix or handler (separate multiple prefix with space)

LANGUAGE.description: An available bot language (DO NOT CHANGE)

QUALITY.description: An available stream quality...Fill 'high', 'low' or 'medium' As Per Your Needs.

STREAM_MODE.description: A Stream Mode For Your Bot...Fill 'audio' or 'video' In It.

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Change it to 'True' if you want to make /play commands only for admins

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Spotify client id get it from https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications...IF YOU DONT KNOW WHAT IS THIS...SO LEAVE IT BLANK

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Spotify client secret get it from https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications...IF YOU DONT KNOW WHAT IS THIS...SO LEAVE IT BLANK
